name: Rolling By
description:
This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2022 with the theme Duality.

Use the mouse, click and drag to tilt the environment, and carefully lead each ball to the end goal! 

Credits

  • Game Created by Leah (@Lebrra) & Wes  (@WesMcW)
  • Fog Shader by @Cyanilux
  • Music - Ethereal Relaxation by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/8719-ethereal-relaxation License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
